title: Grandma Spider brings the Sun
description: Half the world is in darkness, so Possum, Buzzard, and Fox try to steal part of the sun. Then, Grandmother Spider decides to have a go at bringing light and warmth to her animal friends. Who will succeed? Listen to storyteller Kate Corkery telling this Native American story from the Cherokee people, and find out.
itunes:title: Grandma Spider brings the Sun
itunes:author: Wardour Studios
